headline: Adani companies’ decent earnings offer only moderate relief

main.description: Signage of Adani Group in Mumbai, India, on Wednesday, on Feb. 15, 2023. Adani Group said it has adequate cash reserves and its listed companies are able to refinance their debts, in a credit report aimed at reassuring investors after a critical investigation by US short-seller Hindenburg Research last month.. Photographer: Indranil Aditya/Bloomberg via Getty Images

description: The Indian conglomerate is still reeling from a short-seller’s attack

children.data: Adani Enterprises reported robust earnings. Its ports-to-power parent conglomerate had a solid 2022. Not solid enough to reassure investors: the Indian group’s market value is down by $130bn since a short-seller accused it of fraud last month (which the group denies). Its rebuttal of the charges has slowed but not arrested the slide. To preserve cash, Adani will reportedly halt some capital spending.

bodyText:
On February 14th Adani Enterprises reported robust earnings. Its ports-to-power parent conglomerate had a solid 2022. Not solid enough to reassure investors: the Indian group’s market value is down by $130bn since a short-seller accused it of fraud last month (which the group denies). Its rebuttal of the charges has slowed but not arrested the slide. To preserve cash, Adani will reportedly halt some capital spending. ■
To stay on top of the biggest stories in business and technology, sign up to the Bottom Line, our weekly subscriber-only newsletter.

print.headline: Adani companies’ decent earnings offer only moderate relief
